'''Vishap's Rest''' is an [[Event Domain]] during the [[Energy Amplifier Initiation]] [[Event]]. The [[Energy Amplifier]] is used during this domain.

==Ley Line Disorder==
* Defeated [[Geovishap Hatchling]]s will drop unstable High-Energy Crystal Cores that will explode when character get near them, dealing {{Color|Geo DMG}} to nearby characters.
